entry.def: Reconstructive surgery or treatment involves rebuilding a part of someone's body because it has been badly damaged, or because the person wants to change its shape.

example.ex: I needed reconstructive surgery to give me a new nose.
example.tran: 我需要接受修复手术重塑一个鼻子。

means.word_mean: 1. helping to restore to good condition;
